name: Maharashtra EBC Scholarship
short_description: Scholarship for Economically Backward Class students in Maharashtra.
full_description: Financial assistance for students from economically backward classes pursuing higher education in Maharashtra.
application_process:
1. Register on Mahadbt portal.
2. Fill application form with academic details.
3. Upload required documents (income certificate, caste certificate).
4. Submit and track status online.

name: Maharashtra Shetkari Sanman Yojana
short_description: Direct income support for farmers in Maharashtra.
full_description: Annual financial assistance of Rs. 6000 to eligible farmers in Maharashtra to support agricultural activities.
application_process:
1. Visit nearest agriculture office or apply online.
2. Submit land ownership documents.
3. Provide bank account details.
4. Receive direct benefit transfer.
